usefulItems: lamington tin or ovenproof dish (25 x 15 cm), baking paper, large bowl, oven
title: Zucchini slice

ingredients.content: 80 g olive oil, plus extra for greasing
100 g cheddar cheese, cut into pieces (3 cm)
1 brown onion (approx. 150 g), cut into quarters
3 rindless bacon rashers (approx. 160 g), cut into pieces

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C. Grease and line a lamington tin or ovenproof dish (25 x 15 cm) with baking paper and set aside.
Place cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>5-7 sec/speed 6<b>, until cheese is evenly grated. Transfer into a large bowl and set aside.
Place zucchini into mixing bowl and grate <b>4-7 sec/speed 4<b>, until zucchini is evenly grated. Transfer into the bowl with the cheese and set aside.
Place onion and bacon into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula, then sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add eggs, rice flour, salt, pepper, reserved grated cheese and zucchini and 80 g olive oil and combine <b>6 sec//speed 4<b>.
Pour mixture into prepared tin or dish and bake for 30 minutes (180°C), or until golden brown. Serve hot or cold.
